header.title: Product Categories
header.subtitle: Discover our curated collections of premium lighting solutions, meticulously designed for both interior and exterior applications.

indoor.title: Indoor Lighting
indoor.subtitle: Interior Collection
indoor.description: Sophisticated lighting solutions designed to enhance every interior space. From ambient ceiling fixtures to accent wall lights, our indoor collection combines aesthetic excellence with functional illumination.

outdoor.title: Outdoor Lighting
outdoor.subtitle: Exterior Collection
outdoor.description: Weather-resistant lighting engineered for outdoor environments. Illuminate gardens, pathways, and architectural features with fixtures built to withstand the elements while delivering exceptional performance.

features.consultationDescription: Professional lighting design assistance to help you select the perfect fixtures for your project.
features.technicalDescription: Comprehensive installation guides and technical specifications for all products.
features.qualityDescription: All fixtures undergo rigorous testing to meet international lighting standards.

features.title: Lighting Study

features.title: Premium Quality Products

features.title: Fast Delivery

features.title: Extended Warranty

features.title: Cash on Delivery
